Author: firefoxtrot
Text: This may be harmful according to most research. If they body doesn’t want to start menstruating, it shouldn’t be forced into it.  But yep be patient!

Author: bir_die
Text: It takes time, honestly. Even when you’re doing well in recovery, your body is still readjusting to everything. Your hormones take the longest to fully return to normal.   Hormonal birth control would be your best bet to help. Though if your hormones are still really out of whack, it might wreck a little havoc on your system. It sounds like you’ve been doing pretty well food-wise, though; so it’s mostly depending on where your weight is it. I’d talk to your womens health specialist first, of course. Honestly that’s where you’ll get a much better answer.
